3 area::area ()
4 {
5  // read parameters
6  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/cell_warn", cell_warn, 1000);
7  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/resolution", resolution, 1.0);
8  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/create_map", create_map, false);
9 
10  // check of global (gps) coordinates are used
11  string pos_type = "global";
12  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/pos_type", pos_type, pos_type);
13  global = pos_type == "local" ? false : true;
14 
15  // service client for converting gps to local coordinates
16  if (global) {
17  fix_to_pose_client = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::FixToPose>("gps/fix_to_pose");
18  ROS_DEBUG("Wait for fix_to_pose service...");
19  fix_to_pose_client.waitForExistence();
20  }
21 }

23 bool area::closest_bound (cpswarm_msgs::ClosestBound::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::ClosestBound::Response &res)
24 {
25  // use origin
26  if (req.point.x == 0 && req.point.y == 0) {
27  req.point.x = origin.x;
28  req.point.y = origin.y;
29  }
30 
31  // find minimal distance to any area bound
32  for (int i = 0; i < coords.size(); ++i) {
33  // coordinates of two neighboring polygon points
34  geometry_msgs::Point p1;
35  p1.x = coords[i].x;
36  p1.y = coords[i].y;
37  geometry_msgs::Point p2;
38  p2.x = coords[(i+1)%coords.size()].x;
39  p2.y = coords[(i+1)%coords.size()].y;
40 
41  // minimal distance to line connecting the two points
42  double dist = abs((p2.y - p1.y) * req.point.x - (p2.x - p1.x) * req.point.y + p2.x * p1.y - p2.y * p1.x) / hypot(p2.x - p1.x, p2.y - p1.y);
43 
44  // found smaller distance
45  if (res.dist == 0 || dist < res.dist) {
46  // return indexes
47  res.index.clear();
48  res.index.push_back(i);
49  res.index.push_back((i+1) % coords.size());
50 
51  // return actual coordinates
52  res.coords.clear();
53  res.coords.push_back(p1);
54  res.coords.push_back(p2);
55 
56  // return distance
57  res.dist = dist;
58  }
59  }
60 
61  return true;
62 }

64 bool area::get_area (cpswarm_msgs::GetPoints::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetPoints::Response &res)
65 {
66  res.points = coords;
67  return true;
68 }

70 bool area::get_center (cpswarm_msgs::GetPoint::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetPoint::Response &res)
71 {
72  // compute centroid / barycenter
73  for (auto c : coords) {
74  res.point.x += c.x;
75  res.point.y += c.y;
76  }
77  res.point.x /= coords.size();
78  res.point.y /= coords.size();
79  return true;
80 }
81 
82 nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid area::get_gridmap ()
83 {
84  // no map existing yet, i.e., no map server
85  if (map_exists == false && create_map == true) {
86  // get coordinates
87  double xmin = numeric_limits<double>::max();
88  double xmax = numeric_limits<double>::min();
89  double ymin = numeric_limits<double>::max();
90  double ymax = numeric_limits<double>::min();
91  for (auto p : coords) {
92  if (p.x < xmin)
93  xmin = p.x;
94  if (p.x > xmax)
95  xmax = p.x;
96  if (p.y < ymin)
97  ymin = p.y;
98  if (p.y > ymax)
99  ymax = p.y;
100  }
101  int x = int(ceil((xmax - xmin) / resolution));
102  int y = int(ceil((ymax - ymin) / resolution));
103 
104  // warn about large grids
105  if (x*y > cell_warn)
106  ROS_WARN("Given coordinates seem wrong, grid map extremley large: %d cells!", x*y);
107 
108  // generate grid map data
109  cpswarm_msgs::OutOfBounds::Request req;
110  cpswarm_msgs::OutOfBounds::Response res;
111  vector<int8_t> data;
112  for (int i=0; i<y; ++i) { // row major order
113  for (int j=0; j<x; ++j) {
114  // check if cell is within area
115  req.pose.position.x = j * resolution + xmin;
116  req.pose.position.y = i * resolution + ymin;
117  out_of_bounds(req, res);
118 
119  // out of bounds
120  if (res.out)
121  data.push_back(100); // occupied
122 
123  // inside area
124  else
125  data.push_back(0); // free
126  }
127  }
128  map.data = data;
129 
130  // set map header
131  map.header.stamp = Time::now();
132  map.header.frame_id = "map";
133 
134  // set map meta data
135  map.info.map_load_time == Time::now();
136  map.info.resolution = resolution;
137  map.info.width = x;
138  map.info.height = y;
139 
140  // position of cell (0,0)
141  map.info.origin.position.x = xmin;
142  map.info.origin.position.y = ymin;
143 
144  map_exists = true;
145  }
146 
147  return map;
148 }
149 
150 bool area::get_map (nav_msgs::GetMap::Request &req, nav_msgs::GetMap::Response &res)
151 {
152  if (map_exists == false && create_map == false)
153  ROS_WARN("Providing empty map!");
154  res.map = get_gridmap();
155  return true;
156 }

159 {
160  res.point = origin;
161  return true;

164 bool area::get_rotation (cpswarm_msgs::GetDouble::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetDouble::Response &res)
165 {
166  // get coordinates
167  geometry_msgs::Point pl, pb, pr;
168  pl.x = numeric_limits<double>::max();
169  pb.y = numeric_limits<double>::max();
170  pr.x = numeric_limits<double>::min();
171  for (auto p : coords) {
172  // left most point
173  if (p.x < pl.x || (p.x == pl.x && p.y < pl.y))
174  pl = p;
175 
176  // bottom most point
177  if (p.y < pb.y)
178  pb = p;
179 
180  // right most point
181  if (p.x > pr.x || (p.x == pr.x && p.y < pr.y))
182  pr = p;
183  }
184 
185  // no rotation required
186  if ((pl.x == pb.x && pl.y == pb.y) || (pr.x == pb.x && pr.y == pb.y))
187  return false;
188 
189  // rotate clockwise
190  if (pr.y < pl.y) {
191  res.value = -atan2(pr.y - pb.y, pr.x - pb.x);
192  }
193 
194  // rotate counter clockwise
195  else {
196  res.value = -atan2(pb.y - pl.y, pb.x - pl.x);
197  }
198 
199  return true;
200 }
201 
202 bool area::out_of_bounds (cpswarm_msgs::OutOfBounds::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::OutOfBounds::Response &res)
203 {
204  // the winding number counter, i.e., how often a ray from the point to the right crosses the boundary
205  int wn = 0;
206 
207  // loop through all edges of the polygon
208  for (int i = 0; i < coords.size(); ++i) {
209  // ray crosses upward edge
210  if (coords[i].y <= req.pose.position.y && coords[(i+1)%coords.size()].y > req.pose.position.y && is_left(coords[i], coords[(i+1)%coords.size()], req.pose.position))
211  ++wn;
212 
213  // ray crosses downward edge
214  else if (coords[i].y > req.pose.position.y && coords[(i+1)%coords.size()].y <= req.pose.position.y && is_right(coords[i], coords[(i+1)%coords.size()], req.pose.position))
215  --wn;
216  }
217 
218  // pose is outside
219  if (wn == 0)
220  res.out = true;
221 
222  // pose is inside
223  else
224  res.out = false;
225 
226  return true;
227 }
228 
229 void area::global_to_local ()
230 {
231  cpswarm_msgs::FixToPose f2p;
232 
233  // convert given area to local coordinates
234  vector<geometry_msgs::Point> local;
235  for (auto c : coords) {
236  f2p.request.fix.longitude = c.x;
237  f2p.request.fix.latitude = c.y;
238  if (fix_to_pose_client.call(f2p)) {
239  local.push_back(f2p.response.pose.pose.position);
240  }
241  else
242  ROS_FATAL("AREA_PROV - Failed to convert area bounds to local coordinates");
243  }
244  coords = local;
245 }
246 
247 void area::set_origin ()
248 {
249  if (global) {
250  cpswarm_msgs::FixToPose f2p;
251 
252  // get origin from gps node
253  ServiceClient get_gps_origin_client = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::GetGpsFix>("gps/get_gps_origin");
254  ROS_DEBUG("Wait for get_gps_origin service...");
255  get_gps_origin_client.waitForExistence();
256  cpswarm_msgs::GetGpsFix gpso;
257  if (get_gps_origin_client.call(gpso)) {
258  // convert origin to local coordinates
259  f2p.request.fix = gpso.response.fix;
260  if (fix_to_pose_client.call(f2p)) {
261  origin = f2p.response.pose.pose.position;
262  }
263  else
264  ROS_FATAL("AREA_PROV - Failed to convert origin to local coordinates");
265  }
266  else
267  ROS_FATAL("AREA_PROV - Failed get GPS coordinates of origin");
268  }
269 
270  else {
271  // read origin from parameters
272  double x,y;
273  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/x", x, 0.0);
274  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/y", y, 0.0);
275  origin.x = x;
276  origin.y = y;
277  }
278 }
279 
280 bool area::is_left (geometry_msgs::Point p0, geometry_msgs::Point p1, geometry_msgs::Point p2)
281 {
282  // >0 for p2 left of the line through p0 and p1
283  // =0 for p2 on the line
284  // <0 for p2 right of the line
285  return ((p1.x - p0.x) * (p2.y - p0.y) - (p2.x - p0.x) * (p1.y - p0.y)) > 0;
286 }
287 
288 bool area::is_right (geometry_msgs::Point p0, geometry_msgs::Point p1, geometry_msgs::Point p2)
289 {
290  // >0 for p2 left of the line through p0 and p1
291  // =0 for p2 on the line
292  // <0 for p2 right of the line
293  return ((p1.x - p0.x) * (p2.y - p0.y) - (p2.x - p0.x) * (p1.y - p0.y)) < 0;
294 }
